actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that members of Reserve components of the Armed Forces who are not serving on active duty may establish individual retirement accounts.

summary.text: Provides that members of reserve components of the armed forces who are not serving on active duty may establish individual retirement accounts under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that members of Reserve components of the Armed Forces who are not serving on active duty may establish individual retirement accounts.
